Introduction
============

Orange County Lettings is a startup in the real estate rental sector. The startup is currently in the expansion phase in the United States. The objective of this project is to enhance the existing website (GitHub repository: OC Lettings) in the following areas:

- Reduction of various technical debts on the project
- Redesign of the modular architecture
- Addition of a CI/CD pipeline using CircleCI and Render
- Application monitoring and error tracking via Sentry
